modName: Silenced sound for white noise and torches
summary: Silenced wav for many background sounds.
descriptionHtml:
Silenced wav for many background sounds.
I know there are others mods doing the same but none silenced certain ambient noise that cause me headaches, I play for many hours (some weekends for days) and find these anoying.

This mod is Alpha because the chaotic way I work. Basically I have no idea what I m doing
Some files are unnecessary but cause no harm.


17 July 2018 Ver 0.1 :
Replace lots waves with silent one. That include certain winds in interior, certain "white noise" in interior, these ones are the initial purpose of this.
Silence torches. I use a torch once, and dont remember that annoying sound, was very silent except for the occasion spark.

So: Interior wind + white noise + torches.
author: Belcanzor
